demoImages.name: Cereal Box
demoImages.mockOCRText: INGREDIENTS: Whole grain oats, sugar, salt, natural flavor, vitamin E (mixed tocopherols) added to preserve freshness.

demoImages.name: Snack Bar
demoImages.mockOCRText: INGREDIENTS: Almonds, dates, cocoa powder, vanilla extract, sea salt.

demoImages.name: Yogurt Cup
demoImages.mockOCRText: INGREDIENTS: Cultured pasteurized grade A milk, live cultures (L. bulgaricus, S. thermophilus), sugar, natural strawberry flavor, pectin.

demoImages.name: Crackers
demoImages.mockOCRText: INGREDIENTS: Enriched wheat flour (wheat flour, niacin, reduced iron, thiamine mononitrate, riboflavin, folic acid), vegetable oil, salt, yeast, malted barley flour.

demoImages.name: Juice Box
demoImages.mockOCRText: INGREDIENTS: Apple juice from concentrate (water, apple juice concentrate), natural flavor, ascorbic acid (vitamin C).

demoImages.name: Protein Bar
demoImages.mockOCRText: INGREDIENTS: Whey protein isolate, almonds, dates, coconut oil, natural vanilla flavor, stevia leaf extract.

demoImages.name: Instant Noodles
demoImages.mockOCRText: INGREDIENTS: Enriched wheat flour, palm oil, salt, monosodium glutamate, sodium phosphate, artificial chicken flavor, yellow 6, red 40.

demoImages.name: Organic Soup
demoImages.mockOCRText: INGREDIENTS: Organic tomatoes, organic onions, organic carrots, organic celery, organic garlic, sea salt, organic basil, organic oregano.

demoImages.name: Energy Drink
demoImages.mockOCRText: INGREDIENTS: Carbonated water, high fructose corn syrup, taurine, caffeine, artificial flavors, sodium benzoate, potassium sorbate, yellow 5, blue 1.

demoImages.name: Trail Mix
demoImages.mockOCRText: INGREDIENTS: Almonds, cashews, raisins, dried cranberries (cranberries, sugar, sunflower oil), dark chocolate chips (cocoa, sugar, cocoa butter).
